page.title: 12CONSTANTINE RECREATION 2
page.content: VILLAGE GROUP ACTIVITIES;Our village groups are the Brownies,guides,rangers ,cub scouts and sea scouts.Ballet classes are held in the chapel hall and the village play group is held in the chapel schoolroom.Youth club activ ities are disco dancing,table tennis, gymnastics,keepfit,judo and badminton .The judo and youth club activities take place on Fridays. ART SOCIETY;The village arts society has a waiting list.Members are very talented and keen.They hold an annual exhibition of paintings and sculpture during August in the church hall so that visitors can see their work. JOYFUL NEWS;There is a music group of children called,"The Joyful News"run by the Methodist Chapel which sings in the surrounding villages accompanied by guitar and piano playing.
